text: Daylight is a 1996 British American action thriller movie directed by Rob Cohen and starring Sylvester Stallone, Amy Brenneman, Viggo Mortensen, Jay O. Sanders, Dan Hedaya, Claire Bloom, Vanessa Bell Conway, Karen Young, Danielle Harris, Sage Stallone. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1996 action movies Category:1996 thriller movies Category:1990s action thriller movies Category:British action thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Rob Cohen Category:Movies set in New Jersey Category:Movies set in New York City
title: Daylight (1996 movie)
